nodes.text: Junkfort Station was a civil spaceport orbiting the planet Junkfort, where smugglers could get illegal modifications for their ships. Han Solo and Chewbacca arrived there after Princess Leia Organa had sent them out to find one of the mythical shield-disrupting power gems once used by the Pirates of Iridium. After Solo got into a fist fight in the Station's cantina, he and Chewbacca met an agent of Mystra. It was he who told them of an ex-pirate named Raskar who possessed the last remaining shield-disrupting gem in the galaxy.
